name: 30-ecmascript-course-javascript-history-and-versions
description: I’ve learned that JavaScript is the most used language for frontend web development. Each year, ECMA International releases a new ECMAScript edition, which JavaScript follows. It’s crucial to keep up with new features introduced from ES6 to ES13 to stay current with the language’s updates.
author: Julian Avila <julianpedrazajf2@gmail.com>
